abstract: Patrick Modiano, French Nobel Prize-winning author whose mystery novels capture moral ambiguity of life in Nazi-occupied or postwar France, will get wider circulation via new English language translations, including release of his latest book So You Don't Get Lost in the Neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: Long regarded as one of France’s most important novelists, Mr. Modiano is gaining a new audience with English translations after winning the Nobel Prize last year.

headline.main: Patrick Modiano, an Author of Paris Mysteries, Keeps His Own
headline.print_headline: An Author of Paris Mysteries Keeps His Own

snippet: Long regarded as one of France’s most important novelists, Mr. Modiano is gaining a new audience with English translations after winning the Nobel Prize last year.
